content: I show you my stuff with DM Scotty hey friends and fellow gamers I want to show
you these initiative cards I made and they're fun little placeholders for
initiative so I've got you know one if you're the initiative one if your
initiative - if your initiative 3 and so forth I like to also I'd like to as a
game master I'd like to tell the initiative of the monsters for the first
round so you may trade out you may end up I may take your initiative for and
you may have to be initiative 5 let me trade you out a card and so forth and so
on but yeah these are these are fun little cards they were easy to make
they're great for keeping track of the game you're in front of the players and
let's go to the table I'll talk about a little bit of how I made them and then
show you the the artwork on them and little sayings I put so let's hit the
table and we'll check that out just want to talk a little bit about how
I made these first I just printed up this design on the computer I just got
some clipart and then put the number and little saying on it I cut them out
painted them like my parchment technique and then spired them with a little bit
of water down red to give a blood effect then glued them to a cardboard backing
and then I had all my initiative markers number one with surprising reflexes you
make the first move number two you're not the fastest but second we'll have to
do number three the middle of the pack just how you like it
number four waiting waiting have to pick the right moment
number five hope there is something left for you to kill number six waiting for
the chance to prove your skill number seven combat huh what combat number
eight you have the reflexes of a dead chicken and number nine your reflexes
have utterly failed you you
